Rules.InvariantScript: If(SortDescending1, "Sort list in reverse alphabetical order", "Sort list in alphabetical order")
If(DataSourceInfo([@'Web Team Project Portfolio'], DataSourceInfo.CreatePermission), DisplayMode.Edit, DisplayMode.Disabled)
SortByColumns(Filter([@'Web Team Project Portfolio'], StartsWith(Title, TextSearchBox1.Text)), "Title", If(SortDescending1, Descending, Ascending))
